text: this situation is very very serious
trouble me yeah I can say that sir we
are in trouble yes this is a dangerous
situation because the people are dying
because of this flood the water consumes
the land homes belongings and lives this
is 15 miles from the coast but has
become an inland sea today as the rain
cleared we were able to fly over one
part of the flooded interior over people
waiting for food water and medical aid
some sought refuge in the stands of a
stadium here crowded onto a bridge
it leads to a cathedral one of many
buildings battered by the cyclone
others have capped on roofs hundreds
have already been rescued from here but
many more are still in desperate need
this single white tent represents the
international aid community a hundred
more are needed and expected so many
people have taken refuge here
